headline.main: CLASH IN COURT MARKS SPY TRIAL; Lawyer for Herman Lang, One of 15 Suspects, Draws Judge's Caustic Comment

lead_paragraph: A verbal clash, between court and a defense attorney over the latter's conception of his duties as an "American citizen" was the climax in the trial yesterday of fifteen persons accused of espionage and failure to register as agents of a foreign government.
abstract: Herz clashes with judge over Lang's June statement deletions
